akn:section.akn:heading: Equipment and personnel requirements under tank vessel and facility response plans

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general In addition to the requirements for response plans for vessels established by section 1321(j) of this title, a response plan for a tanker loading cargo at a facility permitted under the Trans-Alaska Pipeline Authorization Act (43 U.S.C. 1651 et seq.), and a response plan for such a facility, shall provide for—
